    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Muhlenberg College World War II Navy V-12 and V-5 Collection &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guidedesc">
     Finding aid for Muhlenberg College World War II Navy V-12 and V-5 Collection, Trexler Library, Special Collections and Archives.
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Nov 6, 2014
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/v-12
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=641131&amp;sid=5304795&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>

       <a href="#" onclick="return showDlg('RSS Updates','/process_content.php?m=rssupdates&amp;iid=3322&amp;pid=641131&amp;sid=5304795&amp;gid=0&amp;uid=102691',0)" title="Subscribe to Updates via RSS">
        RSS Updates
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
    </div>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19791658">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19791658">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19791658">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Underwater Obstacle Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content19791658">
          <p>
           <a target="_blank" title="Underwater Training" href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/falciani/Libguide_V-12160001.jpg">
            <img src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/imagemanager/102691/libguide_v-12160001.jpg" />
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="//www.pinterest.com/pin/create/extension/" style="height: 20px; width: 40px; position: absolute; opacity: 0.85; z-index: 8675309; display: none; cursor: pointer; background-color: transparent; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,'); top: 18px; left: 18px;">
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19791658" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19791659">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19791659">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19791659">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Related Trexler Library Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content19791659">
          <p>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
              Title
             </span>
             &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
             <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
              Call Number
              <br />
             </span>
            </span>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            <strong>
             Victory Flashes at Muhlenberg&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
             <a target="_blank" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=X&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=victory+flashes">
              T M952v
             </a>
            </strong>
            <br />
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            Biweekly newsletter sent to students and alumni of the College
            <br />
            serving in the war effort. Written by either Gordon Fister,
            <br />
            Director of Public Relations or John Wagner, Alumni Secretary.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino; color: #000000;">
            <strong>
             [Log books of the Navy V-5 Unit] [manuscript]&nbsp;&nbsp; 13 vols.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
             <a target="_blank" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/X%28log+books%29&amp;SORT=D/X%28log+books%29&amp;SORT=D&amp;SUBKEY=%28log+books%29/1%2C48%2C48%2CB/frameset&amp;FF=X%28log+books%29&amp;SORT=D&amp;1%2C1%2C">
              E N327aL
             </a>
            </strong>
           </span>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino; color: #000000;">
            <strong>
            </strong>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            v.1-6. Log books, Aug. 22, 1943-July 27, 1944.--v.7. Parcel post,
            <br />
            telegrams, special delivery. v.8. Arrival and departure of civilians.
            <br />
            v.9 Airport log.--v.10. Airport extra duty.--v.11. Extra duty log book.
            <br />
            v.12. Extra duty (arranged by cadets)--v.13. Liberty book.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            <strong>
             Muhlenberg College Alumni Quarterly
            </strong>
           </span>
           &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
           <strong>
            &nbsp;
            <a target="_blank" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/Xa%3Blumni+magazine&amp;SORT=DZ/Xa%3Blumni+magazine&amp;SORT=DZ&amp;extended=0&amp;SUBKEY=a%3Blumni+magazine/1%2C1391%2C1391%2CB/frameset&amp;FF=Xa%3Blumni+magazine&amp;SORT=DZ&amp;3%2C3%2C">
             <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
              T M952A
             </span>
            </a>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             &nbsp;
            </span>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             <a target="_blank" title="Muhlenberg Weekly" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/collections/special-collections/muhlenberg-weekly.html">
              The Muhlenberg Weekly Archive Online
             </a>
             <br />
            </span>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             &nbsp;
            </span>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             <a target="_blank" title="Letters Finding Aid" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/letters">
              Muhlenberg College World War II Correspondence Collection Finding Aid
             </a>
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/wwii">
              <br />
              <br />
             </a>
            </span>
           </strong>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             The collection comprises correspondence to and from
             <span style="color: #000000;">
              262
             </span>
            </span>
           </span>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             Muhlenberg students and alumni. Carbon copies of Gordon Fister&rsquo;s and John Wagner&rsquo;s replies are included in the folders along with the original letters from the servicemen. Correspondence takes the form of letters, postcards, and V-mail. Folder contents vary from a few change-of-address postcards to detailed letters describing battles and experiences in the European and Pacific theatres, as well as many from men in U.S training camps and medical schools.
            </span>
           </span>
           <strong>
            <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino;">
             </span>
            </span>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-family: georgia,palatino; color: #000000;">
            <span style="color: #888888;">
             &nbsp;
            </span>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19791659" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">

            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Susan Falciani
